seo.title_override: Seattle Mattress Disposal Guide 2026: Easy & Eco-Friendly
seo.meta_desc_override: Seattle mattress disposal made easy! Avoid fines up to $5,000 with our 2026 guide. Learn about convenient curbside pickup options & eco-friendly recycling.

hero_hook: Don't let Seattle's notorious rain make disposing of your old mattress a soggy, heavy burden.
neighborhoods: Ballard, Capitol Hill, Queen Anne, Fremont, West Seattle, Columbia City, Wallingford, Greenwood, Ravenna, University District, Belltown, Downtown, South Lake Union, Beacon Hill, Madrona

curbside_rules.placement_time: On collection day, set out special items where you would normally have your solid waste service collected. Items must be out at the collection point by 7:00 a.m. on that collection day.
curbside_rules.the_catch: The utility account holder must make the request. The person(s) responsible for the combined utility bill must be able to authorize charges on the account. Costs vary by the type of item collected. For safety reasons, please remove any refrigerator and freezer doors that have latches. Items made of absorbent material must have a waterproof cover on rainy days. Items placed outside must be on a flat, level surface (no stairs) and easily accessible from the street. If the normal solid waste location is a secured area, please place the bulky item outside.
curbside_rules.schedule_logic: Schedule a special item pickup To request the collection of large or hard to dispose of items at your home, schedule online or call Seattle Public Utilities Customer Service at (206) 684-3000. Special items will be collected on the next regular garbage collection day, after the pickup has been scheduled. UDP customers that live in a single-family home and receive a Seattle Public Utilities bill in their name can get two free special item pickups per year when calling for collection.

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Seattle averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.
